display_information.name: OptiBot
display_information.description: OptiBot helps operations teams access business metrics, performance data, and operational insights instantly through natural language queries.
display_information.long_description:
OptiBot is your AI-powered operations data assistant. Simply @ mention OptiBot with your question in natural language, and it will search through your operational data using advanced AI agents and return the results as a downloadable CSV file.

Features:
• Natural language query processing
• Real-time data access through MCP integration
• CSV file generation and delivery
• Threaded conversation support
• Performance metrics and KPIs
• Campaign and conversion data
• System health monitoring
• Operational trends and analytics

Just ask OptiBot about your data and get instant insights!
